sentences.english: The letter added that counselling had been arranged for pupils and staff.
sentences.chinese: 信中說，已爲學生和教職員工安排了心理諮詢。

sentences.english: On behalf of the staff at Canada Weifang Secondary School (CWSS), we would like to welcome you.
sentences.chinese: 代表中加班的教職員工，我們對您表示衷心地歡迎。

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全體教職員工講了話。

sentences.english: The Microcomputer Lab is for students, faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 該微電腦實驗室是給學生和教職員工使用的。

sentences.english: Schools in Hong Kong are seriously under- staffed.
sentences.chinese: 本港學校教職員工嚴重不足。

sentences.english: Seventeen alumni and 14 non-alumni faculty have won the Nobel Prize.
sentences.chinese: 十七校友及14個非校友教職員工共獲得過諾貝爾獎。

sentences.english: School of existing staff 200 people, full-time teachers, nearly 160 people.
sentences.chinese: 學校現有教職員工200多人，專任教師近160人。

sentences.english: BJ: that's really convenient for both students and staff.
sentences.chinese: 恩，對於學生和教職員工都很方便的。

sentences.english: At Westlake College, more than 60 percent of the staff uses the computers.
sentences.chinese: 在韋斯特萊克大學，60%的教職員工使用電腦。

sentences.english: The existing staff 150 people, including 98 full-time teachers.
sentences.chinese: 現有教職員工150人，其中專任教師98人。

definition: student of a senior high school

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: family members of nationals residing abroad
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
